root: ^Father, may I ask you a question?

c-0: ^Of course, my child. What is it that you seek?
^ It's just that...I couldn't help but notice that the artist seems to be in pain while she works. What is going on with her? What is this "gift of God"?

Priest_answer: ^Ah, the 'suto kala'. Worry not, dear. Although our painter is incredibly gifted, her blindness leaves her strained at times.
^Okay, Father. I won't press the matter further. (End dialogue)
^I noticed that...she has certain body modifications. Could her 'gift' stem from that?

c-1: ^The priest frowns, glancing at the painter with contempt.
^Her gift is from God himself, not some metallic scrap. I suggest you don't worry yourself with these matters.

c-0: ^You know our sanctuary prides itself on our natural, organic ways. It is our duty to uphold traditional values, especially in these troubled times. Don't forget that.
